entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
